title: Drawing, "Design for a Woven Hanging "Triptych Over a Blue Couch"", April 1, 1972
signed: Signed with initials and dated in pen and black ink, lower right corner:  4.1.72 T.G. [marked off above and at left by lines from rest of inscription]
inscribed: Inscribed in blue ballpoint pen across lower edge:  A tryptich over blue couch-/Panels are about 20" by 20"/strong twill textures in the landscape colors deep./suspended from aluminum structure; on verso in graphite, upper left corner:  880
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Three square panels with landscape motifs suspended by diagonal thread from a horizontal rod.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Woven Hanging "Triptych Over a Blue Couch"", April 1, 1972.
April 1, 1972. Crayon, graphite on white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-97.
